TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SchemaSerializationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the schema serialization mode for a typed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Setting the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.SchemaSerializationMode%2A> property of a typed <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to ExcludeSchema provides the option of omitting schema information from the serialization payload.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SchemaSerializationMode ExcludeSchema = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Skips schema serialization for a typed T:System.Data.DataSet?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SchemaSerializationMode IncludeSchema = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Includes schema serialization for a typed T:System.Data.DataSet?qualifyHint=False
